answers.answer: Lol that's too funny... I use to catch my parents making popcorn and ice cream after we went to bed... The smell would wake me up lol but now I do it to my 5 yr old. When she's in bed I make ice cream every night and feel guilty for it...
We are horrible at leading buy example hey
Lol I raided the bowl of chocolate from my son trick or treating after he went to bed the other night.
He owes you for life anyways for creating him

Your not the only one! I did it to my niece before I had my daughter and now I do it to her! I love pixie sticks and starburts and I'm always stealing them from her Halloween candy when shes in her room finding a toy lol
omg love this haha so funny
Omg I wish I could eat candy! I have gestational diabetes and can't have any sugar!!
This made me giggle. Somethings are just far too good for kids.
This thread reminds me of the movie Matilda when the mean lady eats candy in front of the little girl and says "much too good for children" lol
Blessedx2 were not evil miss trunchable! We are just mums who enjoy having things for ourselvs. Its good to do somthing small for you for your own snitty I'm shore all you other mums can agree.
I do like to have a few yummy things without having to share!!!
lol i thought i was the only one feeling guilty after but i just want to have a piece of chocolate for myself once in awhile!
Love that there is so many mummy's taking a bit of time to spoil themselves. After all we deserve a lill something for us after all we do for our family's

question: So my son is happily watching a movie in the lounge and i have snuck off to my bead to hide ant eat lollies becouse i don't want to shair them with him. Its horrible i know i should sair and i will I'm just gonna pick out all my favorets first
title: Hiding from my 4yo son :/
